body_html: Thanks @asellem, @rockyrhodes! I'd like to give it a go. Do you have any suggestions of an example to try? Or better yet, has anyone written up a quickstart? For example, I don't see a Makefile in the lite directory. I'm assuming there's some process to generate it but I couldn't figure out how.

body: Thanks @asellem, @rockyrhodes! I'd like to give it a go. Do you have any suggestions of an example to try? Or better yet, has anyone written up a quickstart? For example, I don't see a Makefile in the `lite` directory. I'm assuming there's some process to generate it but I couldn't figure out how.
